text: Bambusa blumeana,J.J.Roemer & J.A.Schultes, 1830 In: Syst. Veg. 7: 1343 also known as spiny bamboo or thorny bamboo, is a species of bamboo occurring in Tropical Asia. This bamboo is known locally as: kawayang tinik in the Philippines, buluh duri in Malay and tre gai or tre lá ngắn in Vietnam. ==Gallery== Bambus blumean 160602-58955 ponr.JPG Bambus blumean 170107-0114 jtg.JPG ==References== Category:Bamboo species
title: Bambusa blumeana
